 Returns the target of the underlying call. More...
 

Detailed Description

MI-level Statepoint operands

Statepoint operands take the form: <num call="" arguments>="">, <call target>="">, [call arguments], <StackMaps::ConstantOp>, <flags>, <StackMaps::ConstantOp>, <num other="" args>="">, [other args], [gc values]

unsigned llvm::StatepointOpers::getNumVMSArgs ( ) const
inline

Returns the number of non-gc non-call arguments attached to the statepoint. Note that this is the number of arguments, not the number of operands required to represent those arguments.

Returns the index of the operand containing the number of non-gc non-call arguments.
